description: Selects all elements with the specific tag name.
Selects a single element with the specific id.
selects: The single element that has an id "test-id"

description: Selects all elements with the specific class.
selects: All elements that have a class "test-class"

description: Selects elements that match any one of the selectors.
selects: Elements that have a class "test-class" or have an id "test-id"

description: Selects elements with even indices (index starts with 0).
Selects elements with odd indices (index starts with 0).
Selects the root element of the document. The root element of HTML is always the <html> element.
selects: The root element of the document.

description: Selects the element with the specific index (index starts with 0).
Selects all elements at indices that are greater than the specific index (index starts with 0).
selects: All <p> elements that have indices greater than 4

description: Selects all elements at indices that are less than the specific index (index starts with 0).
selects: All <p> elements that have indices less than 4

description: Selects all elements that do not match the specific selector.
selects: All <p> elements that do not have a class "test-class"

description: Selects all header elements, i.e. <h1>, <h2>, <h3>, etc.
Selects all elements that are currently animated.
selects: All elements with class "changed" that are currently animated

description: Selects all elements with the language attribute starting with the specific value.
selects: All <p> elements that have a language attribute whose value starts with "en"
